sections.general:
SENIOR INTERIOR DESIGNER
Professional Summary
Interior Designer with diverse experiences working on commercial projects throughout the United States utilizing AutoCAD. Design experiences
include commercial, facility planning, education, government, healthcare, retail and residential. Proven abilities to work on projects independently
or as part of a team from inception at programming meetings to completion with budget reconciliation.
sections.skills:
AutoCAD, budget, consultation, client, clients, IBM, interior design, Lotus, notes, mechanical, meetings, Microsoft Excel, Excel, office, Microsoft
Project, Microsoft Word, pricing, procurement, programming, Proposal, Research, safety, upgrades

Accomplishments
Numerous programs, conferences and seminars related to the field.
All were approved CEU courses for CID and/or IIDA.
Affiliations

President 1998 to 1999, President 1996 to 1998, President Elect 1995 to 1996, Treasurer/Secretary 1994 to 1995 Nature Conservancy
National Trust for Historic Preservation
